Record.ClassificationPath: Cardiovascular Diseases/Heart Diseases/Heart Valve Diseases/Tricuspid Valve Stenosis
Record.Description: The pathologic narrowing of the orifice of the TRICUSPID VALVE. This hinders the emptying of RIGHT ATRIUM leading to elevated right atrial pressure and systemic venous congestion. Tricuspid valve stenosis is almost always due to RHEUMATIC FEVER.
